subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Ahhh the infamous Fish!
author: Zack Widup
full_text:
I could go into that quite a bit, having studied quantum electrodynamics 
extensively.  But everything - matter, light, all forms of energy, etc. 
all break down to ... motion. It just builds into more complicated schemes 
and becomes light, sound, radio waves, coffee cups and coffee, etc.
:-)

Zack


On Mon, 18 Aug 2008, black bear hollow wrote:

> Yes true, and made up of "light". But what IS light??? Energy?
>
> w.
> On Aug 18, 2008, at 10:23 AM, Zack Widup wrote:
>
>> Actually, that's not quite right. All we are is motion within motion.
>> :-)
>> 
>> Zack
>
>
